The changes align with service requests instead of specimens, as a single specimen can be used for multiple service requests. <https://www.figma.com/design/Z93EYKSa1MdBmXndsMBJSQ/Care?node-id=9325-9962|Figma link>
• Shared Care sub-solutions logos with Bodhi.
*Next*
• Find a design solution for the styling inconsistencies in facility feature badges highlighted by Aditya.
• Revisit the service request user flow and address missing pieces, such as invoice printing and the review page for lab test results.
